jobDescription: Job DetailsTITLE: Programmer Analyst - InternDUTIES: Analyze user needs to develop and customize computer applications software. Develop, modify and test the code, forms and script that allow computer applications to run. Perform application studies and evaluations, design systems and procedures, conduct work simplification and measurement studies. Analyze and design database within an application area with the aim of optimizing operational efficiency. Write programs to store, locate, and retrieve specific data and information from the database. Prepare operations and procedure manuals to assist application development team. Analyze and deliver the change requests as per the schedule.REQUIREMENTS: Bachelors degree in Engineering, Information Systems or Computer Science.HOURS: 9:00am to 5:30pm 40 hours per weekCONTACT: Ashley ForqueLOCATION: Austin, TXWILLINGNESS TO TRAVEL: Yes, 100% of the time.DATE POSTED: Apr 08, 2018
